title: Kenya
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 404 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 610L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     U and Y
description: Kenya covers many interesting facts about this African country, from amazing wildlife to the more than thirty tribes that live there. Students will enjoy learning about this beautiful country. Vibrant pictures and maps supplement the reading.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
